sentence.Network_en: Euclid was trying to convey his idea of a geometrical point.

sentence.Network_en: Population is increasing in that country in a geometrical progression.
sentence.Network_cn: 那个国家的人口正以几何级数增长.

sentence.Network_en: The building has intricate geometrical designs on several of the walls.
sentence.Network_cn: 建筑物的几面墙上有复杂的几何图案.

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to or determined by geometry
2. characterized by simple geometric forms in design and decoration;

sentences.sentence: "a buffalo hide painted with red and black geometric designs"

stems_affixes.word_buile: geography地理[学]+ical……的→adj.地理学的,地理的
pontiff罗马教皇,主教+ical……的→pontifical像教皇一样自以为是的
symbol符号,记号,象征+ical……的→adj.表示象征的,符号的
tyranny暴政,苛政,专治+ical……的→tyrannical暴虐的,残暴的
